entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -14.7°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 60 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain and ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 70 km/h gusting to 90 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 late in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
